      static boolean LineSearchConditions.checkArmijoCondition(AbstractFunction objective, Vector point, Vector direction, double stepSize, double c, double objectiveValueAtCurrentPoint, Vector objectiveGradientAtCurrentPoint)
      Checks whether the Armijo condition (also known as the sufficient decrease condition) is satisfied for a given objective function, point, direction and step size.
      static boolean LineSearchConditions.checkGoldsteinConditions(AbstractFunction objective, Vector point, Vector direction, double stepSize, double c, double objectiveValueAtCurrentPoint, Vector objectiveGradientAtCurrentPoint)
      Checks whether the Goldstein conditions are satisfied for a given objective function, point, direction and step size.
      static boolean LineSearchConditions.checkWolfeConditions(AbstractFunction objective, Vector point, Vector direction, double stepSize, double c1, double c2, boolean strong, double objectiveValueAtCurrentPoint, Vector objectiveGradientAtCurrentPoint)
      Checks whether the Wolfe conditions are satisfied for a given objective function, point, direction and step size.
      abstract double StepSizeInitializationMethod.computeInitialStepSize(AbstractFunction objective, Vector point, Vector direction, Vector previousPoint, Vector previousDirection, double initialStepSize, double previousStepSize)
      Computes the initial step size using the selected method and the available data.
      Constructors in org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch with parameters of type AbstractFunction 
      Constructor and Description
      ArmijoInterpolationLineSearch(AbstractFunction objective, double c)
      Constructs an Armijo interpolation based line search solver for the provided objective function instance, using the provided parameter for the Armijo condition.
      BacktrackingLineSearch(AbstractFunction objective, double contraptionFactor, double c)
      Constructs a backtracking line search solver for the provided objective function instance and using the provided parameters.
      IterativeLineSearch(AbstractFunction objective)
      Constructs an iterative line search solver for the provided objective function instance.
      StrongWolfeInterpolationLineSearch(AbstractFunction objective, double c1, double c2, double aMax)
      Constructs a strong Wolfe interpolation based line search solver for the provided objective function instance and using the provided parameters.
